name: worthlessly
content:
worthlessly adverb
(NO VALUE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no worth or value in money: If you don't exercise the stock option by midnight tonight, it will expire worthlessly. They objected to the idea of spending billions of dollars on worthlessly ineffective missile defence systems.
